T02nagpancu:99: pratyutpādād bhavet tatra dvyayutaṃ śataṣoḍaśam || Pk_1.44 ||

T02nagpancu:122: dhyānādhyayanavītaṃ tu tathāpi jāpa ucyate || Pk_1.55 ||
T02nagpancu:127: sidhyate tasya trailokyaṃ māsaikena na saṃśayaḥ || Pk_1.57 ||
T02nagpancu:128: ṣaḍ lakṣāṇi japitvā tu mantraṃ jñānasamudbhavam |
T02nagpancu:129: vajrasattvaṃ namaskṛtya pūrṇamāsyāṃ sa sidhyati || Pk_1.58 ||
T02nagpancu:130: na tasya vratamākhyātaṃ nākṣasūtraṃ na mantrakam |
T02nagpancu:131: dhāraṇā homakarmāṇi varjyante ca parāparam || Pk_1.59 ||
T02nagpancu:135: ardhayāmikavelāyāṃ dvau dvau karmaṇi tiṣṭhataḥ || Pk_1.61 ||
T02nagpancu:137: agnihotraparo bhūtiṃ mokṣaṃ dhyānaparo labhet || Pk_1.62 ||
T02nagpancu:143: aśraddadhānastvabhiṣekahīno vārtā kramasyāpi ca tasya noktā || Pk_1.65 ||
T02nagpancu:144: yaḥ śraddadhāno gurubhaktiraktaḥ śuśrūṣaṇāyāṃ ca sadābhiyuktaḥ |
T02nagpancu:145: grāhyaḥ śrutiṃ naiva dhanaṃ nirīkṣyaṃ gurupradhāno 'ya guruprasādaḥ ||
T02nagpancu:146: girīndramūrdhnaḥ prapatet tu kaścit neccheccyutiṃ tu cyavate tathāpi |
T02nagpancu:147: guruprasādāptahitopadeśa icchenna moktaṃ sa tathāpi muktaṃḥ || Pk_1.67 ||
T02nagpancu:152: anuttarasandhirityaparanāmā sarvaśuddhiviśuddhikramaḥ dvitīyaḥ namaḥ śrīvajrasattvāya namaste 'stu namaste 'stu namaste 'stu namo namaḥ |
T02nagpancu:153: evaṃ stute namaste 'stu kaḥ stotā kaśca saṃstutaḥ || Pk_2.1 ||
T02nagpancu:154: yathā jalaṃ jale nyastaṃ ghṛtaṃ caiva yathā ghṛte |
T02nagpancu:155: svakīyaṃ ca svayaṃ paśyej jñānaṃ yatreha vandanā || Pk_2.2 ||
T02nagpancu:158: śūnyaṃ ca atiśūnyaṃ ca mahāśunyaṃ tṛtīyakam |
T02nagpancu:164: ālokaśśūnyaṃ prajñā ca cittaṃ ca paratantrakam |
T02nagpancu:173: cakitaṃ saṃśayaścaiva mātsaryaṃ ceti kīrtitāḥ || Pk_2.11 ||
T02nagpancu:176: strīsaṃjñā tathā proktā mandākārā tathaiva ca |
T02nagpancu:181: parikalpitaṃ tathā proktaṃ proktaṃ caitasikaṃ tathā || Pk_2.15 ||
T02nagpancu:183: harṣaṇaṃ caiva prāmodyaṃ vismayo hasitaṃ tathā || Pk_2.16 ||
T02nagpancu:185: dhairyaṃ vīryaṃ ca mānaśca kartṛhartṛbalāni ca || Pk_2.17 ||
T02nagpancu:187: madhyamaṃ sāhasaṃ rādraṃ vilāso vairameva ca || Pk_2.18 ||
T02nagpancu:188: śubhaṃ ca vāk sphuṭā satyamasatyaṃ niścayastathā |
T02nagpancu:190: alajjā dhūrtaduṣṭaśca haṭhaḥ kuṭila eva ca |
T02nagpancu:193: sūryamaṇḍalasaṃjñā ca vajrasaṃjñā tathaiva ca || Pk_2.21 ||
T02nagpancu:197: pariniṣpannakaṃ caiva avidyā caiva nāmataḥ || Pk_2.23 ||
T02nagpancu:201: avidyāyāḥ kṣaṇāḥ sapta vijñeyāḥ sukṣmayogibhiḥ || Pk_2.25 ||
T02nagpancu:204: etāḥ prakṛtayaḥ sūkṣmāḥ śataṃ ṣaṣṭyuttaraṃ divā |
T02nagpancu:206: kṣaṇe lave muhūrtte ca nimeṣe mātrake tathā |
T02nagpancu:209: mātrā tu hastatālaṃ syāt kṣaṇādīnāṃ tu lakṣaṇam || Pk_2.29 ||
T02nagpancu:217: tadā tatprakṛtīḥ sarvā astavyastāḥ pravartayet || Pk_2.33 ||
T02nagpancu:218: yatra yatra sthito vāyustāṃ tāṃ prakṛtimudvahet |
T02nagpancu:219: yāvat samīraṇotpādo nābhāso niścalo bhavet || Pk_2.34 ||
T02nagpancu:229: yasya vajrābjasaṃyogaḥ saṃvṛtyā tu na vidyate || Pk_2.39 ||
T02nagpancu:231: yathā prabhedaṃ vijñāya jñānavṛttiṃ svabhāvataḥ || Pk_2.40 ||
T02nagpancu:232: lakṣayet satataṃ yogī tāmeva prakṛtiṃ punaḥ |
T02nagpancu:241: anantajanmasāhasraṃ prāpya caivaṃ punaḥ punaḥ || Pk_2.45 ||
T02nagpancu:247: atha candraṃ samālambya vajracinhaṃ prakalpayet || Pk_2.48 ||
T02nagpancu:253: yathoktaṃ śrīsamājādau tatra tatra suvistaram || Pk_2.51 ||
T02nagpancu:259: nirvikāraṃ nirābhāsaṃ nirdvandvaṃ paramaṃ śivam || Pk_2.54 ||
T02nagpancu:260: astīti na ca nāstīti na ca vākyagocaram |
T02nagpancu:273: savaiśvaryaṃ tathā prāpya vajrakāye pramodase || Pk_2.61 ||
T02nagpancu:274: evaṃ śrutvā tu taṃ śbdaṃ visarjyāsphānakaṃ tataḥ |
T02nagpancu:277: sāśano nāśano naiva na maunī nāpyamaunavān || Pk_2.63 ||

T02nagpancu:338: gurucaṇasaparyāprāptatattvopadeśaḥ prabhavati sa hi vaktuṃ tantrarājopadeśam || Pk_2.93 ||

T02nagpancu:403: saiva gandharvasattvaḥ syād vajrakāyaḥ sa eva hi |

T02nagpancu:416: yad yad ālambayed yogī tad tad māyaiva kalpayet || Pk_3.33 ||
T02nagpancu:417: darpaṇe pratibimbaṃ ca svapnaṃ māyāṃ ca budbudam |
T02nagpancu:418: indrajālaṃ ca sādṛśyaṃ yaḥ paśyed sa prabhuḥ smṛtaḥ || Pk_3.34 ||
T02nagpancu:419: dṛśyate spṛśyate caiva yathā māyā jagat sadā |
T02nagpancu:420: na copalambhaḥ saṃvṛtyā māyāvat parikīrtitaḥ || iti || Pk_3.35 ||
T02nagpancu:421: yad yad indriyamārgatvaṃ māyā tattat svabhāvataḥ |
T02nagpancu:423: sarvatra sarvataḥ sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvadā svayam |

T02nagpancu:431: nāsti kiñcid asādhyaṃ vai vajrasattvena lakṣitam |
T02nagpancu:433: kleśāḥ karmapathā dehaḥ kartāraśca phalaṃ ca vai |
T02nagpancu:436: jāyante vividhā rogāsteṣāṃ māyā bhiṣagjitam || Pk_3.43 ||
T02nagpancu:438: śāśvatocchedamālambya sa vaivartī bhavet punaḥ || Pk_3.44 ||
T02nagpancu:441: kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ kiṃ vā nopāsitaṃ tapaḥ |
T02nagpancu:444: tat taddhi gurave deyaṃ tadevākṣayamicchatā || Pk_3.47 ||
T02nagpancu:445: ācāryo harate pāpam ācāryo harate bhayam |
T02nagpancu:448: sāvajñastattvadharmeṣu tasya tattvaṃ na darśayet || Pk_3.49 ||
T02nagpancu:450: samayācārarakṣī ca kramaṃ tasya pradarśayet || Pk_3.50 ||
T02nagpancu:460: tasmai tuṣṭāya gurave pūjāṃ kuryāt tu śaktitaḥ || Pk_4.3 ||
T02nagpancu:462: gaṇamaṇḍalamadhye tu kuryāt pūjāṃ yathāvidhi || Pk_4.4 ||
T02nagpancu:466: ardharātre cābhisiñcet suśiṣyaṃ kṛpayā guruḥ || Pk_4.6 ||
T02nagpancu:470: nopariṣyasi kāmeṣu nirālamba namo 'stu te || Pk_4.8 ||
T02nagpancu:478: stutvā kṛtāñjaliḥ śiṣyo guraṃ sañcodayet punaḥ || Pk_4.12 ||
T02nagpancu:489: no rātrirnāpi sandhyā na ca bhavati divā yaḥ prakṛtyā vimuktaḥ sa syād bodhikṣaṇo 'yaṃ varagurukathito yogināmeva gamyaḥ || Pk_4.17 ||
T02nagpancu:490: naiśaṃ dhvāntaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ vyapagatamakhilaṃ sāndhyatejastu yasmin bhāsvānnodeti yāvat kṣaṇa iha vimale darśayed bhūtakoṭim |
T02nagpancu:494: anantabhūtaṃ tvathavāntabhūtaṃ tat sarvaśūnyaṃ pravadanti santaḥ ||
T02nagpancu:495: gamanāgamanaṃ ca yatra nāsti kṣayavṛddhī na cāpyabhāvabhāvau |
T02nagpancu:496: ativismayarūpam arūpyavismayaṃ sthitimannāpi na cāpi gatvaram || Pk_4.20
T02nagpancu:497: yadasti-nāstivyavahāramuktaṃ na puṇyarūpaṃ na ca pāparūpam |
T02nagpancu:498: na puṇyapāpātmakamagrabhūtaṃ tat sarvaśūnyaṃ pravadanti buddhāḥ || Pk_4.21
T02nagpancu:500: yaḥ paryaṭejjñānamayo nṛsiṃhaḥ kṛtsnaṃ jagat so 'vyayakāyalābhī || Pk_4.22
T02nagpancu:502: samīlitākṣo 'pi vibuddhanetraḥ samāhitaḥ sanna samāhitau'sau || Pk_4.23 ||
T02nagpancu:503: sa vāgyuto vāgasamanvito 'pi bhogānvitaḥ so 'pi virupavṛttiḥ |
T02nagpancu:504: sa lokanāthaḥ parabhṛtyabhūto yastattvavit kṣīṇasamastadoṣaḥ || Pk_4.24 ||
T02nagpancu:508: bhūtakoṭiṃ viśed yogī piṇḍagrāha iti smṛtaḥ || Pk_4.26 ||
T02nagpancu:509: sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva pūrvaṃ kṛtvā prabhāsvaram |
T02nagpancu:510: paścāt kuryāt tathātmānam anubhedakramo hyayam || Pk_4.27 ||
T02nagpancu:512: bhūtakoṭiṃ tathā yogī praviśocca muhurmuhuḥ || Pk_4.28 ||
T02nagpancu:514: anena dhyānayogena sadā tiṣṭhati tattvavit || Pk_4.29 ||
T02nagpancu:521: mudrābandhaṃ prakuryād vā mantraṃ cāpi japed yadi |
T02nagpancu:524: sarvakṛt sarvaliṅgī ca sarvaśūnyena sidhyati || Pk_4.34 ||
T02nagpancu:525: prāptopadeśaḥ subhagaḥ suśiṣyo baudhau hi cittaṃ paramārthanāma |
T02nagpancu:527: sarvabhāvavigataṃ skandhadhātvāyatanagrāhyagrāhakavarjitaṃ dharmanairātmyasamatayā svacittam ādyanutpannaṃ śūnyatāsvabhāvamiti |
T02nagpancu:529: ratnaṃ gṛhaṃ vā hastyaśvaṃ grāmaṃ vā śayanāsanam || Pk_4.36 ||
T02nagpancu:530: dāsaṃ dāsīṃ priyāṃ bhāryāṃ putrīṃ cāpyativarṇabhām |
T02nagpancu:532: prāptācāryaprasādo vimaladṛḍhamatiḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvaḥ svacchaṃ śuddhaṃ susūkṣmaṃ paramaśivamayaṃ buddhanirvāṇadhātum |
T02nagpancu:533: nirdvandvaṃ nirvikalpaṃ satatasukhamayaṃ bhāvayet tattvayogī puṇyāpuṇyād vimuktaḥ svayamiha bhagavān jāyate vajrasattvaḥ || Pk_4.38 ||
T02nagpancu:541: ekībhāvo bhaved yatra yuganaddhaṃ taducyate || Pk_5.2 ||
T02nagpancu:542: saṅkleśaṃ vyavadānaṃ ca jñātvā tu paramārthataḥ |
T02nagpancu:543: ekībhāvaṃ tu yo vettiṃ sa vetti yuganaddhakam || Pk_5.3 ||
T02nagpancu:545: ekīkṛtya cerad yogī sa vetti yuganaddhakam || Pk_5.4 ||
T02nagpancu:546: grāhyaṃ ca grāhakaṃ caiva dvidhā buddhirna vidyate |
T02nagpancu:547: abhinnatā bhaved yatra tadāha yuganaddhakam || Pk_5.5 ||
T02nagpancu:549: yuganaddhakramākhyaṃ vai tattvaṃ vetti sa paṇḍitaḥ || Pk_5.6 ||
T02nagpancu:551: yuganaddha iti khyātaḥ kramo 'yaṃ buddhagocaraḥ || Pk_5.7 ||
T02nagpancu:553: yatra sthito mahāyogī tad bhaved yuganaddhakam || Pk_5.8 ||
T02nagpancu:555: ityevaṃ kalpanā nāsti tat taddhi yuganaddhakam || Pk_5.9 ||
T02nagpancu:559: tayoreva samājaṃ yad yuganaddhakramo hyayam || Pk_5.11 ||
T02nagpancu:561: utthānaṃ ca tato yatra samantād yuganaddhakam || Pk_5.12 ||
T02nagpancu:562: saṃvṛtiṃ paramārthaṃ ca pṛthag jñātvā vibhāgataḥ |
T02nagpancu:563: saṃmīlanaṃ bhaved yatra yuganaddhaṃ taducyate || Pk_5.13 ||
T02nagpancu:564: tathātalambanaṃ naiva vyutthānaṃ yatra naiva hi |
T02nagpancu:565: yuganaddhaṃ bhavet tacca yogināṃ padamavyayam || Pk_5.14 ||
T02nagpancu:575: yā sthitiryogināṃ buddhā yuganaddhaṃ vadanti tat || Pk_5.19 ||
T02nagpancu:579: iti yā kalpanābhinnā yatra tad yuganaddhakam || Pk_5.21 ||
T02nagpancu:581: yaḥśāntiṃ vetti yogīndraḥ sa prāpto yuganaddhakam || Pk_5.22 ||
T02nagpancu:582: evaṃ vai yaḥ sthito yogī yuganaddhakrame sthitaḥ |
T02nagpancu:583: ucyate sa hi sarvajñaḥ tattvadarśī ca viśvadhṛk || Pk_5.23 ||
T02nagpancu:587: buddhatvaṃ vajrasattvatvaṃ sarvaiśvaryaṃ tathaiva ca || Pk_5.25 |
T02nagpancu:591: asyaiva vācakāḥ sarve nānyat tatrābhidhīyate || Pk_5.27 ||
T02nagpancu:593: anenaiva gatā buddhā gaṅgāyāḥ sikatopamāḥ || Pk_5.28 ||
T02nagpancu:595: bhāvayed yuganaddhaṃ tu caryāṃ cāpi tadanvayām || Pk_5.29 ||
T02nagpancu:596: yathātmani tathā śatrau yathā bhāryā tathātmajā |
T02nagpancu:597: yathā mātā tathā vaiśyā yathā ḍombī tathā dvijā || Pk_5.30 ||
T02nagpancu:598: yathā vastraṃ tathā carma yathā ratnaṃ tathā tuṣam |
T02nagpancu:599: yathā mūtraṃ tathā madyaṃ yathā bhaktaṃ tathā śakṛt || Pk_5.31 ||
T02nagpancu:601: yathā stutikaraṃ vākyaṃ tathā vākyaṃ jugupsitam || Pk_5.32 ||
T02nagpancu:602: yathā rudrastathā vajrī yathā rātrīstathā divā |
T02nagpancu:603: yathā svapnaṃ tathā dṛṣṭaṃ yathā naṣṭaṃ tathā sthitam || Pk_5.33 ||
T02nagpancu:604: yathā saukhyaṃ tathā duḥkhaṃ yathā duṣṭastathā sutaḥ |
T02nagpancu:605: yathāvīcistathā svargastathā puṇyaṃ tu pāpakam || Pk_5.34 ||
T02nagpancu:606: evaṃ jñātvā cared jñānī nirviśaṅkastu sarvakṛt |
T02nagpancu:609: anena krīḍatāṃ loko yuganaddhasamādhinā || iti || Pk_5.36 ||
T02nagpancu:619: śrīmatpotalake gabhīravivṛtidhvānapratidhvānite sāndrasvāṃśucayaśriyā valayito lokeśvaraḥ pātu vaḥ ||
T02nagpancu:621: na satyā nāsatyā na ca tadubhayī nāpyanubhayī nirullekhā sarvākṛtivaramayī madhyamakadhīḥ
T02nagpancu:622: jinaḥ śāstā saiva sthira-calajagattattvamapi sā svasaṃvittirdevī jayati sukhavajrapraṇayinī
T02nagpancu:624: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat |
T02nagpancu:625: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ ||
